title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice  2016 NEW HD-TS x264 eXcluSiv
description:
INFO


Video: x264 2000kbps HD-2Pass

Resolution: 720x400 480p @ 30fps

Audio: Mp3 2.0 Digital Line Audio

Langauge: English

Subtitles: hardcoded English when needed

Source: 1080pHD VIP & Exclusive-line thx Th0r

Sample: yes 2 include



IMDB link	http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2975590/

Well had this source since yesterday but require some extensive work to 

get the best out of it. its a brand new source not hive 720p NightVision 

source, what?  ah.. does not matter move on..

Video was already zoomed in but pretty damn HD but noisy so i left 

perspective as it is and fix other stuff as much as possible without 

losing details.  source is same as Deadpool 2016 1080p HDCAM so i cut 

video in 4 different parts,  and work on each part separately.

Once i am done with each part then i sync the Exclusive line audio which

i fixed at first place which hive and others are using right now.


ENCODE

Fix colors, stablize, sharp, bright, rgb, resize, some walter white blue

math Magic and synced audio to my finish video.

Sample included. Cheers ! 

P/S: CPG and Exclusive Group are One since day One. 


PLOT


Fearing the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on 

Superman, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really 

needs. With Batman and Superman fighting each other, a new threat, 

Doomsday, is created by Lex Luthor.
